search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for iContact (icontact.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for iContact is: [https://www.icontact.com/pricing](https://www.icontact.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
**Easy** and Affordable  
Email Marketing Prices
------------------------------------------------

**Engage, Wow, and Grow Your Audience Without Breaking The Bank**

Experience the ease of email marketing without breaking the bank. Our plans are designed to fit businesses of all sizes, ensuring you get top-tier marketing tools at affordable prices. From crafting engaging emails to reaching your audience effectively, our platform supports your marketing journey every step of the way. Join us and start transforming your email marketing strategy today.

#### How many contacts do you have?

Click to select your option

Standard
--------

$92/year

$143/year

$286/year

$459/year

$745/year

$1122/year

$1836/year

$2550/year

$3570/year

### **Key Features**

*   Pre Designed Email Templates
*   Drag and Drop Editor
*   Landing Page Templates
*   Automations

[Select Plan](https://www.icontact.com/signup?buynow=1&term=1&sl=500&sAccountType=standard)

Premium
-------

$163/year

$275/year

$418/year

$745/year

$1112/year

$1622/year

$2336/year

$3152/year

$4070/year

### **Key Features**

*   Unlimited Users
*   Drag and Drop Editor
*   Social Media Posting
*   AI Content Assistant

[Select Plan](https://www.icontact.com/signup?buynow=1&term=1&sl=500&sAccountType=premium)

Need More?
----------

### [Custom](https://www.icontact.com/pricing/#)

### **Flexible & Personalized**

*   Large Contact Lists
*   Premium Support
*   Large Sending Volume
*   Creative Assistance

[Contact Us](https://www.icontact.com/contact/)

Have questions? Give our Sales team a call [1-877-820-7837](tel:18778207837)

[Close comparison chart](https://www.icontact.com/pricing/#)

![Image 1: iContact logo for inner section](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/footer-logo.png)

### Compare our plans

#### Standard

$**28** /month

For businesses up to **2,500 contacts**

[Buy Now](https://www.icontact.com/pricing/#)

#### Premium

$**41** /month

For businesses up to **2,500 contacts**

[Buy Now](https://www.icontact.com/pricing/#)

Loved by thousands businesses

![Image 35: fc-logo-1](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/fc-logo-1.png)

![Image 36: fc-logo-2](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/fc-logo-2.png)

![Image 37: fc-logo-3](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/fc-logo-3.png)

![Image 38: fc-logo-4](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/fc-logo-4.png)

![Image 39: fc-logo-5](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/fc-logo-5.png)

![Image 40](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/footer-logo.png)

Empowering businesses everywhere
--------------------------------

iContact has helped over thousands of small and independent businesses since 2003 send billions of emails each month.

**Segment leader on G2 Crowd ![Image 41](https://www.icontact.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/stars.png)**

![Image 42](https://www.icontact.com/pricing/)

“I’ve been a faithful iContact customer since 2011. In that time I’ve sent out a weekly eblast every single week without fail. iContact is my primary source of marketing for my retail seafood and wine market, and I would be lost without it. While there are other formats available, and at times I’ve certainly considered switching over, I don’t regret sticking with iContact.

Customer support is one of their greatest strengths, and down through the years I’ve certainly taken advantage of their expertise and have never been turned away from a phone call or had an email inquiry not returned in a reasonable amount of time.”

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Can I change my plan later?

Yes, we allow you to upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

What are the main differences between the plans?

Our Premium plan offers access to all of our features, with limited restrictions. Our Standard plan will restrict access to some features as well as add limits to the amount of lists, segments, automations and landing pages you have.

Is there a limit to the number of emails I can send?

Yes, each of our plans has sending limits based off the amount of contacts included in your plan. If you go over your monthly sending limits, you will be charged overages for the send.

How does billing work?

Our billing is monthly on the first of every month for monthly plans. For annual plans, we bill on the first of the month annually. When you sign up you will be billed a prorated monthly amount.

iContact, Easy Solution For All Your Email Marketing Needs
----------------------------------------------------------

*   Pre-Designed Email Templates
*   Easy Drag and Drop Email Builder
*   Hundreds of Premium Stock Photos

Get detailed pricing information on iContact services for all types of businesses. Find the perfect pricing to fit your email marketing budget.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing varies based on the number of contacts and includes both monthly and annual options.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Designed for businesses with basic email marketing needs.
Includes advanced features for businesses with higher email marketing demands.
